title: Drawing, "Decorative Studies; Verso: Anatomical Studies of Animals and Male Heads", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink over graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Five candelabra; fountain with putti; bronze door; man seated under base of church; Verso: head of horse; head of barbarian and head of man in profile from the antique.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Studies; Verso: Anatomical Studies of Animals and Male Heads", 1814–18.
1814–18. Pen and ink over graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2588.
